name: CDIF Building Blocks repository
abstract: Repository assembling building block for CDIF metadata and profiles, using OGC building block patterns 2025-10-20
description: Includes a set of property modules implementing various metadata content requirements form the CDIF Discovery profile using schema.org entities and properties.

bblocks.name: String Array Type
bblocks.abstract: Simple reusable array of strings used throughout ADA metadata

bblocks.name: Creative Work Type
bblocks.abstract: Shell type for labeled links to creative works (schema:CreativeWork)

bblocks.name: L2MS Instrument Detail
bblocks.abstract: Laser-2 Mass Spectrometry cube data with ionization parameters

bblocks.name: Physical Mapping Type
bblocks.abstract: DDI-CDI variable mapping for data structure components

bblocks.name: ARGT Instrument Detail
bblocks.abstract: ARGT (Argon) document type with phase and isotope analysis

bblocks.name: Basemap Instrument Detail
bblocks.abstract: Basemap images with RGB channels and pixel scaling

bblocks.name: DSC Instrument Detail
bblocks.abstract: Differential Scanning Calorimetry heat tabular data

bblocks.name: EA-IRMS Instrument Detail
bblocks.abstract: Elemental Analysis Isotope Ratio Mass Spectrometry collection

bblocks.name: EMPA Instrument Detail
bblocks.abstract: Electron Microprobe Analysis instrument-specific detail properties

bblocks.name: ICP-OES Instrument Detail
bblocks.abstract: Inductively Coupled Plasma Optical Emission Spectrometry detail properties

bblocks.name: LAF Instrument Detail
bblocks.abstract: Laser Ablation Fluorescence processed/raw data detail properties

bblocks.name: QRIS Instrument Detail
bblocks.abstract: QRIS (Raman) with calibration and illumination parameters

bblocks.name: SLS Instrument Detail
bblocks.abstract: Structured Light Scanning shape models and partial scans

bblocks.name: VNMIR Instrument Detail
bblocks.abstract: Very-Near Mid-IR spectroscopy with detailed measurement parameters

bblocks.name: XCT Instrument Detail
bblocks.abstract: X-ray Computed Tomography images with detailed scan parameters

bblocks.name: XRD Instrument Detail
bblocks.abstract: X-ray Diffraction tabular data with geometry and wavelength

bblocks.name: Image Type
bblocks.abstract: ADA image with componentType classification for analytical images

bblocks.name: Supplemental Document Image Type
bblocks.abstract: Supplemental document images including analysis locations and context photos

bblocks.name: Spatial Registration Type
bblocks.abstract: Pixel coordinate system registration for images and maps

bblocks.name: Analysis Instrument Type
bblocks.abstract: Analytical instrument definition combining NXinstrument and prov:Entity

bblocks.name: Analysis Laboratory Type
bblocks.abstract: Laboratory/facility definition combining NXsource and schema:Place

bblocks.name: Labeled Link
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining propertis for a labeled link, implemented using a profile of schema.org/CreativeWork.

bblocks.name: Properties for PROV was generated by
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining properties for documenting hardware or software used in the creation of a dataset..

sources.title: See Provenance for discovery in Implementation of metadata content items

bblocks.name: Identifier
bblocks.abstract: schema.org properties for an identifier implemented as schema.org/PropertyValue.

bblocks.name: Temporal Extent properites
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining metadata elements to document the temporal extent applicable to the described resource.

bblocks.name: XDI data structure description
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining properties to describe the structure of an XDI file. This is a fixed-wide tabular text data structure for describing the result of x-ray absorption spectroscopy experiments.

bblocks.name: Collection Type
bblocks.abstract: Set of related files with identical information models or composite datasets

bblocks.name: NanoIR Instrument Detail
bblocks.abstract: Nano-IR spectroscopy collections with phase analysis

bblocks.name: NanoSIMS Instrument Detail
bblocks.abstract: Nano Secondary Ion Mass Spectrometry with isotope tracking

bblocks.name: PSFD Instrument Detail
bblocks.abstract: Point Spread Function Data with image names and conditions

bblocks.name: Data Cube Type
bblocks.abstract: CDI DimensionalDataStructure for multidimensional data

bblocks.name: Document Type
bblocks.abstract: Supplemental documents for calibration, methods, and analysis info

bblocks.name: Other File Type
bblocks.abstract: Non-standard file formats approved for ADA submission

bblocks.name: Image Map Type
bblocks.abstract: Spatially registered image map with pixel coordinates and component types

bblocks.name: Properties for PROV was derived from
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining properties for documenting sources used for compiled or aggregated dataset..

sources.title: See Provenance for discovery in Implementation of metadata content items

bblocks.name: Defined Term
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining propertis of a term from a named or identified vocabulary, with a label, and URI.Based on Schema.org/definedTerm

bblocks.name: Instrument Detail Types
bblocks.abstract: Instrument-specific detail types for ADA analytical techniques

bblocks.name: Tabular Data Type
bblocks.abstract: CDI PhysicalDataSet for tabular/structured data files

bblocks.name: Simple quality measurement properties
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining properties for documenting a quality measuremenet associated with a resource.

bblocks.name: schema additionalProperty properties
bblocks.abstract: Schema for a schema:PropertyValue used to specify a property of an element that is not defined in the JSON schema..

bblocks.name: Organization
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining propertis of an organization in CDIF context. Implementation is a profile of schema.org/Organization.

bblocks.name: Spatial Extent
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining properties for documenting the spatial extent of a resource; based on science on schema.org.

bblocks.name: VariableMeasured
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining propertis for schema.org varialbleMeasured as defined for CDIF discovery. Implemented as schema.org/PropertyValue

bblocks.name: Files Type
bblocks.abstract: DataDownload with checksum, size, encoding format, and file detail

bblocks.name: WebAPI properties
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining properties for documenting a WebAPI used as a resource distribution option.

bblocks.name: Analytical instrument properties for x-ray absorption spectroscopy
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining properties for documenting instrumentation used in XAS analysis.

bblocks.name: Material Sample for x-ray absorption study
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining properties for documenting a material sample that is the mainEntity (target) of an XAS analysis.

bblocks.name: Person
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining propertis of a person, a profile of schema.org/Person.

bblocks.name: VariableMeasured with DDI-CDI extensions
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining properties for schema.org variableMeasured with some DDI-CDI properties, for implementation of CDIF discovery XAS profile. Implemented as schema.org/PropertyValue

bblocks.name: Action properties
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining properties to implement description of an action, a profile of schema.org/Action.

bblocks.name: X-ray absorption, PROV wasGeneratedBy Activity
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining properties for documenting the provenance of an x-ray absorption dataset

bblocks.name: Person or Organization in Role
bblocks.abstract: Schema to documennt a person or organization in a role relative to some resoruce, uses schema.org/Role construct.

bblocks.name: DataDownload
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining properties of a DataDownload. Used as value to describe a distribution

bblocks.name: Funding
bblocks.abstract: properties for acknowledging funding, CDIF profile of schema.org/funding and schema.org/MonetaryGrant.

bblocks.name: Meta Metadata
bblocks.abstract: basic properties to for a metadata record, CDIF discovery profile

bblocks.name: Data structure description for HDF5 NEXUS files
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining properties to describe data structure in an HDF5 file, for use with CDIF x-ray absorption spectroscopy profile

bblocks.name: WebAPI properties
bblocks.abstract: Schema defining properties for documenting a WebAPI used as a resource distribution option.

bblocks.name: CDIF discovery metadata, Optional elements
bblocks.abstract: Definition of optional metadata elements for CDIF discovery profile

sources.title: Cross Domain Interoperability Framework Discovery Profile

bblocks.name: Optional Fields for XAS data
bblocks.abstract: XAS profile files that provide additional useful information

bblocks.name: Required Fields for XAS data
bblocks.abstract: XAS profile files that extend requirements of CDIF discovery. Field content: x-ray source,definition, Data/mode, element/symbol, edge,Instrument/source/type, Instrument/source/name, Instrument/source/probe, Instrument/monochromator/type, Instrument/monochromator/d_spacing, Instrument/monochromator/reflection, Sample/name

bblocks.name: Metadata Conforms to for XAS
bblocks.abstract: For XAS profle, need to declare conformatnce iwht provile in the metadata

bblocks.name: Base CDIF mandator metadata
bblocks.abstract: Definition of Metadata elements that are mandatory for CDIF discovery profile

sources.title: Cross Domain Interoperability Framework Discovery Profile

bblocks.name: CDIF discovery metadata
bblocks.abstract: Gather building blocks to generate a CDIF discovery record

bblocks.name: ADA Product Profile
bblocks.abstract: Top-level ADA product metadata profile composing all ADA building blocks

bblocks.name: ADA EMPA Profile
bblocks.abstract: Technique-specific profile for Electron Microprobe Analysis (EMPA) products

bblocks.name: ADA ICP-MS Profile
bblocks.abstract: Technique-specific profile for Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometry (ICP-MS) products

bblocks.name: ADA VNMIR Profile
bblocks.abstract: Technique-specific profile for Very-Near Mid-Infrared (VNMIR/FTIR) spectroscopy products

bblocks.name: ADA XRD Profile
bblocks.abstract: Technique-specific profile for X-ray Diffraction (XRD) products
